title: India should be among top 3 AI giants: PM
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday said his vision was to catapult India into the world’s top three artificial intelligence superpowers, even as he called for common AI standards across the globe.
content:

title: Fed's Daly says US central bank still needs to get inflation down
description: San Francisco Federal Reserve President Mary Daly on Tuesday said the U.S. central bank still needs to get inflation down, and that while artificial intelligence potentially helps in that regard, the Fed's modestly or slightly restrictive policy is also important to making that happen.
content: Feb 17 (Reuters) - San Francisco Federal Reserve President Mary Daly on Tuesday said the U.S. central bank still needs to get inflation down, and that while artificial intelligence potentially helps in that regard, the Fed's modestly or slightly rest... [436 chars]

title: SC flags lawyers using AI to draft petitions, cites non
description: Shocked by a non-existent judgment 'Mercy versus Mankind' cited in a petition, the Supreme Court on Tuesday expressed serious concern over the growing trend of some lawyers filing petitions drafted with the help of artificial intelligence (AI) tools.
content: Shocked by a non-existent judgment "Mercy versus Mankind" cited in a petition, the Supreme Court on Tuesday expressed serious concern over the growing trend of some lawyers filing petitions drafted with the help of artificial intelligence (AI) tools.... [1777 chars]

title: HII Teams with Path Robotics to Integrate Physical AI into Manned and Unmanned Shipbuilding
description: COLUMBUS, Ohio, Feb. 17, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) and Path Robotics signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) today to explore the integration of Path’s physical artificial intelligence (AI) for welding into shipbuilding operations that could accelerate throughput, strengthen the maritime industrial base, and augment the shipbuilding workforce. The MOU signing ceremony took place at Path Robotics’ headquarters and was attended by Eric Chewning, HII’s executive vice president of maritime systems and corporate strategy, and Andy Lonsberry, Path Robotics CEO and co-founder.
content: COLUMBUS, Ohio, Feb. 17, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) and Path Robotics signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) today to explore the integration of Path’s physical artificial intelligence (AI) for welding into shipbuilding operations t... [5839 chars]

title: How Mass Texting Platforms Are Evolving in the Age of AI
description: Mass texting has long been a powerful communication tool for businesses, nonprofits, and organizations looking to reach large audiences quickly. But in the age of artificial intelligence, these platforms are undergoing a remarkable transformation. AI is reshaping how messages are created, delivered, and optimized, making mass texting more personalized, efficient, and strategic than ever before. […]

title: India eyes $200 bil in data center investments as it ramps up its AI hub ambitions
description: India is hoping to garner as much as $200 billion in investments for data centers over the next few years as it scales up its ambitions to become a hub for artificial intelligence, the country’s minister for electronics and information technology said Tuesday. The investments underscore the reliance of tech…

title: Tech and Financial Stocks Drive Modest Gains on Wall Street Amid AI Concerns
description: U.S. stocks saw modest gains as technology shares rebounded and financial stocks provided support. Artificial intelligence concerns had previously triggered selloffs. The Dow Jones and S&P 500 indices rose, with a focus on inflation and potential interest rate cuts. Cruise Line stocks soared, driven by activist investments.
content: On Tuesday, U.S. stocks posted modest gains as a rebound in technology shares and financial stocks provided much-needed support. Despite initial declines, the S&P 500 information technology sector rose nearly 1%, driven by gains in Nvidia and Apple o... [739 chars]

title: Fed must dig deep on AI impact to make right rate calls ahead, Daly says
description: The Federal Reserve must dig deep on the data to assess whether artificial intelligence is boosting productivity growth and enabling faster economic growth without igniting inflation or requiring the Fed to tap the brakes with tighter policy, San Francisco Fed President Mary Daly said on Tuesday.
content: Feb 17 (Reuters) - The Federal Reserve must dig deep on the data to assess whether artificial intelligence is boosting productivity growth and enabling faster economic growth without igniting inflation or requiring the Fed to tap the brakes with tigh... [956 chars]

title: New AI-based approach detects fatty deposits inside coronary arteries using OCT images
description: Researchers have developed a new artificial intelligence-based approach for detecting fatty deposits inside coronary arteries using optical coherence tomography (OCT) images.
